duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee Production Supervisors and 50+ full-time associates on a daily basis.
Set shift level production plans and partner across shifts and across departments to complete daily plans/workload while holding Supervisors accountable for production output and efficiency.
Ensure all Home Chef GMP’s and operational guidelines are being followed and enforced.

Maintain safe and clean work environment by educating and directing personnel on the use of all control points, equipment, and resources; maintaining compliance with established policies and procedures.
Create and implement culture of SOP feedback among team and work with Continuous Improvement team to revise and improve SOPs.
Lead daily huddles, start of shift huddles, and shift passdown report to communicate production plans, efficiency, labor targets, and KPI results.
Coaching and development of production supervisors to ensure positivity and strength of culture.
Understand key KPIs, demonstrate ability to effectively communicate KPI targets and results to supervisors and leads, and provide feedback on efficiency throughout the shift.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 3-5 years of successful managerial leadership experience in a fast-paced environment. Cross-functional experience in 2 or more different departments preferred.
